answer:
Vaccines do not contain human or animal cells or tissues. Read more about vaccine ingredients here. A list of the ingredients in each approved vaccine in Canada can be found in the Canadian Immunization Guide or the vaccine's product monograph available through Health Canada's Drug Product Database.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Vaccines do not contain human or animal cells or tissues.


## Read more about vaccine ingredients here.

A list of the ingredients in each approved vaccine in Canada can be found in the Canadian Immunization Guide or the vaccine's product monograph available through Health Canada's Drug Product Database.
Immunization Nurse
question: Are there any blood fractions, cells, or anything to do with blood products used in the shingles vaccine.
